name: Jewel Thief (熱心人士SunnyRx, 零君)
name_original: Jewel Thief (熱心人士SunnyRx, 零君)
description:
Jewel Thief GO!
Jewel Thief Game On!
Jewel Thief love Jewel and never satisfied. They were trained and the most feared in Jewelry Stores.

Now! Come and join them. Headstrong, get the Jewel and feel the beat.
PK with friends, and to become the real big winner!

Game Features
-The bigger the thief is, the heavier the thief become. Likewise, the smaller the thief is, the lighter the thief is.
-The unscrupulous merchants are with ropes, and the elasticity of each rope is different.
